cx-javascript: Tuundina ka tuni "JavaScript" san ka bɔna, la kan ta'am tum, bii "browser" kuna ka suŋeri.
cx-specialpage-enable-betafeature: [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Content_translation|Content Translation]] de la tuunɛ ti tu kãbelɛ lerege pɛgera kɛ fum yetɔgum puan. [$1 Try it now!]
cx-license-agreement: Fu kɔ'ɔm kelum bɔna la fu sakɛ bɔ'ɔra la [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use Terms of Use] gee fu ka sakɛ ti fu basɛ fu bo'olum la [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL 1.3] "licenses".
cx-error-server-connection: Tuure: kan ta'am tɔkɛ bo "server" la.
cx-desc: basɛ ti la kɔ'ɔm dɛna naana ti la [[Special:ContentTranslation|translate]] "content" pɛgera
cx-publish-page-success: Basɛ ti pɛgerɛ niɛ peelemi $1 puan
cx-publish-error-abuse-filter: Ba baŋɛ la "automatic filter" demesego daaŋɔ la n tari la daaŋɔ fu lerege la puan. "Filter" ŋmɛ: $1
cx-publish-error-empty: "Server" lebese mɛ gee ka le tara "data".
cx-publish-error-readonly: Ba ka sakɛ gulesegɔ n boi wiki puan.
cx-publish-error-spam-blacklist: Ba nyɛ sɛla ti ba wan ta'am iŋɛ n boi fu leregere la puan. Garrsegɔ: $1
cx-publish-error-title-blacklist: Tile la ti fu ŋmɛ la ba zagesɛ mɛ. N beleni fu mɛ looge yu'urɛ ayima bo fu leregere la.
cx-publish-error-unknown: Tuure mina ti ba ka le nyɛta n iŋɛ. Tuure garesegɔ: $1
cx-lost-session: fu sɔsega la daa tole ya
cx-lost-session-draft: fu sɔsega la daa tole ya. Fu demesego duma la kan ta'am biŋe see fum n ŋmɛ ki'isɛ le yɛ'ɛsa n boi "window" ayima puan.
cx-lost-session-publish: fu sɔsega la daa tole ya. Fu kan ta'am niigɛ fu leregere la peelemi see fum n mɔregɛ ŋmɛ ki'isɛ le yɛ'ɛsa n boi "window" ayima puan.
cx-lost-session-dashboard: Suŋa ti tu iŋɛ itegɔ wa, n beleni fu mɛ ŋmɛ ki'isɛ le yɛ'ɛsa.
cx-publish-summary: maalɛ mɛ gee lerege pɛgera la "$1"
cx-translation-target-page-exists: Pɛgerɛ n tari pɔsega [$1 $2] ni kɔ'ɔm bɔna la puti'irɛ "wiki" la puan.Dikɛ bisɛ ti fu bo pɛgerɛ la pɔsega yima yima.
tag-contenttranslation-description: Puti'irɛ la lerege ni ze'ele la tɔgum buyima tari ni puti'irɛ leregere lɔgerɔ tuna.
tag-contenttranslation-v2-description: Puti'irɛ la lerege ni ze'ele la tɔgum buyima puan na tari ni vuurɛ buyi n boi puti'irɛ la leregere lɔkɔ.
tag-sectiontranslation-description: Puti'irɛ la leregere ni ze'ele la bɔberɛ n boi tɔgum buyima tari ni bɔberɛ la leregere aŋa n boi puti'irɛ leregere lɔkɔ.
tag-contenttranslation-high-unmodified-m: Leregere niiɛ ya tari ni puti'irɛ leregere tara "machine" leregeŋɔ la n ka tee se'em la saŋa zo'e zo'e.
cx-beta-desc: Lɔkɔ n wan ta'am lerege pɛgera kalam kiŋɛ fu yetɔgum puan. Pɔsɛ leregera ze'ele [[Special:MyContributions|your contributions page]], gee demese ba zi'an la zi'an demesego yele yele bii zi'an ti ba maalɛ yetɔgum buuri buuri.
cx-entrypoint-dialog-page-doesnt-exist-y: Pɛgedina wa ka le bɔna $1  yɛ'ɛsa. Iŋɛ {{GENDER:|you}} bɔta ti fu maalɛ ka?
cx-entrypoint-dialog-desc:
Fu wan ta'am suŋɛ Wikipiidiya la pɛgerɛ wa leregere.
Leregere de la naana ti fu ta'am maalɛ puti'irɛ n boi fu yetɔgum puan.
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-notice: Maalɛ gɔŋɔ paalega la fu lerege yese yetɔgum kayima ti fu mina.
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-search: Ee pɛgerɛ kayima la fu lerege
cx-special-login-error: Fum sum mɛ ti fu ŋmɛ ki'isɛ gee lerege n boi pɛgerɛ LA puan. [$1 Log in]
cx-tools-instructions-text2: {{GENDER:|You}} ka sum ti fu dikɛ ba za'a pa'asɛ
cx-tools-instructions-text3: {{GENDER:|Make}} gulesegɔ la kaali mɛ suŋa suŋa
cx-tools-instructions-text4: "Machine" leregere tari suŋerɛ gee {{GENDER:|you'll}} nari ti tu lebese gɔŋɔ la mɛ ti la iŋɛ la suŋa.
cx-tools-instructions-text6: Sansɛka {{GENDER:|you}} are happy with the result, press "{{int:cx-publish-button}}".
cx-tools-mt-use-source: Maalɛ sɛla n boi sɔsega la puan
cx-tools-mt-dont-use: Pɔsɛ n boi "paragraph" beele la puan
cx-tools-mt-set-default: gulesɛ fu wan iŋɛ se'em la.
cx-tools-mt-noservices: Leregulegɔ tuusum ka le bɔna yetɔgum la puan. [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Content_translation/Translating/Initial_machine_translation|Why?]]
cx-warning-unsaved-translation: Fu tari la lerege duma ti ba ka nyaŋɛ tum.
cx-error-page-not-found: "$1" pɛgerɛ la ka nyaŋɛ nyɛ n boi $2 wikipiidiya la puan
cx-page-selector-widget-recent-edits-lab: Nananewa ti fu nan kɔ'ɔm demese ka
cx-source-page-selector-input-placeholde: Ee pɛgerɛ ti fu wan lerege
cx-save-draft-save-success: Biŋe {{PLURAL:$1|a minute ago|$1 minutes ago|0=just now}}
cx-contributions-new-article-tooltip: Pɔsɛ gulesera n boi pɛgepaalɛ pua
cx-contributions-translation-tooltip: Lerege pɛgesi'a n pugum bɔna la
cx-publish-destination-header: Dikɛ yɛla n boi zi'an niɛ peelemi
cx-linkcontextitem-missing-title-descrip: Pɛgedina wa nan ka boi nanta
cx-sx-sentence-selector-suggested-transl: Lerege zi'an ti fu bɔkɛ ti fu lerege ze'ele $1
sx-editor-feedback-overlay-clarification: Zamesera ze'ele n demesego duma puan
sx-recent-translation-entrypoint-banner-: Ba lerege ni pɛgedina wa mɛ
sx-recent-translation-entrypoint-dialog-: Yu'ɛ pɛgerɛ la miŋa n boi $1
